languages.text: "Когда узор будет сплетен, в твоих руках будет достаточное могущество, чтобы остановить смертные попытки обрести оружие против нас. Оставайся под пологом — пускай слепцы читают твою душу, они не посмеют нанести удар, пока твое благословение не станет очевидным".

"Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."
languages.original_text: "Когда узор будет сплетен, в твоих руках будет достаточное могущество, чтобы остановить смертные попытки обрести оружие против нас. Оставайся под пологом — пускай слепцы читают твою душу, они не посмеют нанести удар, пока твое благословение не станет очевидным".

traits.locale_text: "When the pattern is woven, in your hands will you find enough power to stop mortals' attempts of obtaining a weapon against us. Stay covered. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare striking until your blessing becomes obvious."

"When the pattern is woven, in your hands will you find enough power to stop mortals' attempts of obtaining a weapon against us. Stay covered. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare striking until your blessing becomes obvious."

"When the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Stay hidden. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes obvious."

"When the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Stay hidden. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes obvious."

"Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."

languages.text: “一旦图案编织完成，你便会拥有强大的力量，可以阻止凡人得到那件用来对付我们的武器。要隐藏在幕后，盲者或许能读懂你的灵魂，但在你的祝福显现之前，他们不敢轻举妄动。”
languages.original_text: "Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."

traits.locale_text: “一旦图案编织完成，你便会拥有强大的力量，可以阻止凡人得到那件用来对付我们的武器。要隐藏在幕后，盲者或许能读懂你的灵魂，但在你的祝福显现之前，他们不敢轻举妄动。”

languages.text: « Quand le motif aura été tissé, vous disposerez du pouvoir nécessaire pour empêcher les mortels de se procurer une arme capable de nous contrer. Restez invisible. L'aveugle peut lire votre âme, mais il n'osera pas frapper tant que votre bénédiction ne sera pas apparente. »
languages.original_text: "Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."

traits.locale_text: « Quand le motif aura été tissé, vous disposerez du pouvoir nécessaire pour empêcher les mortels de se procurer une arme capable de nous contrer. Restez invisible. L'aveugle peut lire votre âme, mais il n'osera pas frapper tant que votre bénédiction ne sera pas apparente. »

languages.text: 「紋様が織り込まれた時、お前は人間たちが我らに差し向ける武器を手にするのを防ぐ力を得る。その身を覆い隠せ。盲目の者たちはお前の魂を読み取ることはあれど、加護が明らかになるまでは手を下すことを恐れるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."

traits.locale_text: 「紋様が織り込まれた時、お前は人間たちが我らに差し向ける武器を手にするのを防ぐ力を得る。その身を覆い隠せ。盲目の者たちはお前の魂を読み取ることはあれど、加護が明らかになるまでは手を下すことを恐れるはずだ」

languages.text: «Cuando la pauta esté tejida, obtendrás el poder de evitar que los mortales obtengan un arma contra nosotros. Mantente ocult{mf|o|a}. Los ciegos podrán leer tu alma, pero no osarán atacar hasta que tu bendición sea aparente».
languages.original_text: "Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la pauta esté tejida, obtendrás el poder de evitar que los mortales obtengan un arma contra nosotros. Mantente ocult{mf|o|a}. Los ciegos podrán leer tu alma, pero no osarán atacar hasta que tu bendición sea aparente».

languages.text: "Wurde das Muster einmal gewoben, habt Ihr die Kraft, Sterbliche daran zu hindern, eine Waffe gegen uns zu erlangen. Bleibt verschleiert. Die Blinden können Eure Seele lesen, doch sie werden es nicht wagen, zuzuschlagen, bis Euer Segen offenbar wird."
languages.original_text: "Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."

traits.locale_text: "Wurde das Muster einmal gewoben, habt Ihr die Kraft, Sterbliche daran zu hindern, eine Waffe gegen uns zu erlangen. Bleibt verschleiert. Die Blinden können Eure Seele lesen, doch sie werden es nicht wagen, zuzuschlagen, bis Euer Segen offenbar wird."

"Wenn das Muster gewebt wurde, besitzt Ihr die Kraft, Sterbliche daran zu hindern, eine Waffe gegen uns zu erlangen. Bleibt im Verborgenen. Die Blinden können Eure Seele lesen, doch sie werden es nicht wagen, zuzuschlagen, bis Euer Segen offensichtlich wird."

languages.text: "Örge örüldüğünde ölümlülerin silahı bize karşı kullanmasına engel olma gücüne kadir olacaksın. Örtülü kal. Kör, ruhunu okuyabilir ama lütfun kendini gösterene kadar sana saldırmaya cesaret edemez."
languages.original_text: "Once the pattern is woven, you will hold the power to stop mortals from obtaining a weapon against us. Remain veiled. The blind may read your soul, but they will not dare strike until your blessing becomes apparent."
